data.text: Haiwa, dai maibvarura matenga mukaburuka pasi,
Nokuti pamakaita zvinhu zvinotyisa zvatakanga tisina kutarisira,
Kubva panguva dzekare hakuna munhu akanzwa,
Munouya kuzobatsira avo vanofarira kuita zvakarurama,
Haiwa, Jehovha, kunyange zvakadaro muri Baba vedu.
Temberi yedu tsvene inobwinya, umo madzibaba edu akakurumbidzai,
Haiwa Jehovha, mushure maizvozvi mungazvidzorawo here?
